Package simsim.core

Interface Summary
Displayable Interface used when the implementing object needs to be drawn in a simulator window.
EncodedMessage This interface is used to convert back a network message in some encoded format to a message object.
MessageHandler This interface is used whenever an incoming message arrives at a node.
 

Class Summary
AbstractNode The base class to extend to create new node types with some specific behavior.
EndPoint Objects of this class represent generic transport endpoints (i.e., they are somewhat equivalent to sockets).
Globals This class manages global simulation properties.
Message This class is the base class for creating the messages to be exchanged by the nodes in the simulation.
Multicasting This class provides basic functionality for joining, leaving and sending messages to groups of nodes.
NetAddress  
Network The abstract base class from which network types are derived.
PeriodicTask This is the base class for creating asynchronous periodic tasks in the simulator.
Scheduler The core engine of the simulation engine.
SerializedMessage An alternative class for creating messages.
Simulation The base class for creating a simulation application.
SoftwareClock  
Spanner Creates a simplified graph covering all the nodes in the network.
Task This is the base class for creating tasks in the simulator.
TcpChannel This class implements blocking network operations, allowing a message to be sent and replied-to within a channel.
 

Enum Summary
Simulation.DisplayFlags
